Title: Prithvi
Actors: Puneeth Rajkumar, Parvathy, Avinash, Sadhu Kokila
Plot: Prithvi Kumar is an young IAS Officer who works as District Commissioner for Bellary District and whose honesty clashes with the illegal gaNi-dhaNigaLu (mining lords) and the corrupt politicians in the highest seats of power in Karanataka.
